mods.abstract: A collection of filk songs, printed in very small type to keep printing costs down.
mods.note: Multiple editions were issued without formal tracking. The type on this is tiny, and the reproduction of my working copy not that great. The compiler isn't responsible for errors, omissions, or eyestrain in the attempt. INDEX IS IN PROGRESS. SONG LIST IS INCOMPLETE.

relatedItem.note: This is very similar to an MIT cheer.
